name: Spelling Bug 1st Gr Words Lite
description:
See how many spelling word cards you can match to create a beautiful butterfly. Or fly with fire bug through 4 different worlds to find the words before the caterpillars can get them! Spelling Bug helps your child learn 1st grade spelling words in 4 games with spectacular sound and fun graphics! Add your own words to match what you do in school.

FEATURES in this language game:
* Learn to spell with flash cards, memory games and puzzles, spelling bees and an exciting word shape game for hours of learning fun
* Word game with 4 worlds and 36 levels (first 5 levels in LITE Version) 100´s of words
* Add as many of your own words as you want (paid version only)!
* Adapts to kids' skills levels so it is always challenging and never too easy.
* Record your own voice
* Phonics based lessons to match school work
* Great for 1st Grade
* See progress in the results tab
* Easy simple to navigate user interface
* COPPA compliant – NO ads, no personal detail is collected, no geolocation.

All lessons and activities teach English and use common core state standards, so you can be sure these games will help give your child a boost in the classroom. And with helpful voice narration and exciting games, they won't want to stop playing and learning!
